thread.section_title: ALittleLuxury.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ALittleLuxury.com.au | alittleluxury.com.au
thread.title: Alex

author: Alex
title: Alex
text: I am living overseas and sadly was going to miss a very important birthday. ALittleLuxury.com.au helped me choose a beautiful gift for this occasion. The website is very easy to work around and the choices are endless. Being able to substitute products with different items is also a real plus. I was so happy with the final gift that I became a member because I know that I will use them again
